snippet: Rickie Fowler won the Wells Fargo Championship in a playoff that included the world’s new No. 1 player, Rory McIlroy.
abstract: Golf Roundup; Rickie Fowler captures three-man playoff to win Wells Fargo Championship golf tournament; other golf news noted. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- Now when Rickie Fowler tees off before every PGA event, he will be introduced as a winner on tour. Fowler captured a three-man playoff Sunday that included Rory McIlroy, the world's new No. 1 player, to win the Wells Fargo Championship at Quail Hollow Club. Beyond the question of when Fowler would win came subtle reminders of his failure to have done so, as during each pre-round player introduction. Even before beginning the final round Sunday, Fowler waited while the tournament victories of his playing partner, Nick Watney, were recited.

headline.main: Fowler Likes His New Label: Champion
